body.p: Permit ^me^ Sir To ask a favor at your hand. I have bineen in the servis of the United States for more then 18. months and Since ^the^ that time I first Enlisted I was Elected to the office of second Lieutanent in ^the^ 25the Regimet of Ky vol and on the account of my health not being Sufficiant to remain in the servis I Resgined the office.

I come home and after my health Recruited some I Raised a potion of a nother compney and accepted they the Position of the office again in 8th Ky cavelary, and I had to Rezine a gain on the same core.

I have Recruited my helth again and wish Purmition to Rase a nother company for the state Servis I can get the men
very quick. for the defence of the State the of most of them have bin in the state servis and are anctious to go in a gain and they wish me to Rais a company I hope you will not hesitate to give me purmission to Raise the co. if it is your Power, which I hope it is by this time if it is not at this ^time^ pleas let me know as soon as you have the Power. I am very antious to go in the servis for the state But I do not think I am able to go in the united states servis I do not no nother I will be subject to the Draft or not pleas write me word. I want if I can go in to cavelary servis for the state. Youres most obediant
Thomas, B, Boyd Lieut as was
